TopicTitle: Will there be official moving parts?

Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbals,

I went back to playing stock recently due to the .24 update. Surprisingly, the only mod I really miss was the Infernal Robotics pack. It added a whole new level of enjoyment and tinkering that should be included in the base game. Anyway, has there been any word about this being added? Heck, I would pay extra for a DLC pack of moving parts and tech tree...

Hi.

Robotics is on the What Not To Suggest list, probably due to being suggested already a number of times. Thread closed, sorry about that.

Feel free to introduce yourself in the Welcome Aboard forum though.
